overview: As soon as the newlyweds pass, Mi-young feels regret about her relationship with Woo-hyun. She thinks she gets married at a young age and she loses herself. She thinks that Woo-hyeon just thinks that she can do well, but she thinks that Mi-yeong is rather like that, and she doesn't want to live like this anymore, so she leaves Woo-hyun. Woo-hyeon, who falls into her disappointment, happens to meet Bora, whom she had a crush on before, and they drink together..
title: Her Gorgeous Sex Life
